title: EP 68: Heroin Inheritance w Cavario Hunter
itunes:title: EP 68: Heroin Inheritance w Cavario Hunter
description:
On this episode we have author, former owner of Don Diva magazine, and D-Boy Cavario Hunter. We discuss his life as a third generation dealer, the books he's published and much more. We would like to officially welcome him to the show as a full time contributor. Grab the best earbuds in the market, RAYCON! Save 15% by using our special code http://www.BUYRAYCON.com/TGC101 See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
